00020 namespace la_manager{
00021 
00022 class POSTaggerEnglish{
00023          vector<ME_Model> vme;
00024 public:
00025         POSTaggerEnglish(string dir){
00026                 cout << "Loading English POS model..." ;
00027                 vme.resize(16);
00028                 for (int i = 0; i < 16; i++)
00029                         vme[i].load_from_file(dir + "/model.bidir." + boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(i));
00030                 cout << "finish!" << endl;
00031         }
00032 
00033         void tag(TermList & input){
00034                 vector<Token> vt;
00035                 TermList::iterator it = input.begin();
00036                 for(; it != input.end() ; it++)
00037                         vt.push_back(Token(it->textString(), "?"));
00038                 const multimap<string, string> dummy;
00039                 bidir_decode_beam(vt, dummy, vme);
00040                 string tmp;
00041                 it = input.begin();
00042                 for (size_t i = 0; i < vt.size(); i++,it++) {
00043                         string p = vt[i].prd;
00044                         it->pos = p;
00045                 }
00046         }
00047 };
00048 
00049 }
